summary: adds a brand new shout to the game
descriptionHtml:
added a new shout to skyrim, suggested to me by here57

effects:
well right now it is a mass paralysis, what i want to add to it and trying is an area damage spell that has no visual effects like a banshee screaming

Important(if you download the banshee scream batch file):
before you go into the game, you must find the shout.txt batch file and change the first two letters of each id to the load order of this esp file. once you have done that you can go into the game, open up console \"~\" and type \"bat banshee shout\" (no caps, two words, and no quotes)

installation:
extract the esp file to your skyrim data folder, for those who dont know where it is: C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data 
or 
use the NMM

method to acquire the shout:
go into command prompt type:
Help dir
help aaz
help zaan
player.teachword XXXXXXXXX
if you have no dragon souls, then use this also player.unlockword XXXXXXXXXX 

sorry i dont really know how to make scripts to obtain the shout without command prompt
author: Intuz0keizaal
